noAPIMsg1: No API available with the name -

appHelpMsg: Applications are required to make API subscriptions and consume them. You will be able to subscribe these applications to APIs from the API details page. Requests made from this application will be throttled by the Application level throttling tier and the subscription level throttling tier
noSubsMsg: No subscriptions created yet. Click on the 'APIs' tab on the top to browse the APIs available for subscription.
showKeysMsg: Keys available. Click 'Show Keys' to view.
prodKeyMsg: Production keys are not yet generated for this application.
sandboxKeyMsg: Sandbox keys are not yet generated for this application.
apisTooltip: Browse the latest versions of published APIs, make subscriptions and generate API keys.
myAppsTooltip: Browse and create applications. Applications are required to make API subscriptions and consume them.
mySubsTooltip: Browse through all the API subscriptions made so far and review the generated API keys.
billingTooltip: Browse the billing details for the requests done for API invocations
